oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Zum Einsatz von Homöopathie bei Schweinen in der Praxis
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Krabiel, Carola
Hörning, Bernhard
Trei, Gerriet
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Health and welfare
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Aim of the study was to get information about the use of homeopathy on pig farms in Germany. Questionnaires of 56 farmers (82 % organic) were evaluated. Only 30 % of organic farmers used homeopathy. In addition, 14 veterinarians and 6 animal health practitioners using homeopathy on pig farms were interviewed. They used homeopathy mainly for fertility problems in sows, mainly on organic farms.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Krabiel, Carola; Hörning, Bernhard and Trei, Gerriet (2013) Zum Einsatz von Homöopathie bei Schweinen in der Praxis. Poster at: 12. Wissenschaftstagung Ökologischer Landbau, Rheinische Friedrich-Wilhelms-Universität, Bonn, 5. bis 8. März 2013.
